## FieldDropdown.onItemSelected\_() method

Handle the selection of an item in the dropdown menu.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onItemSelected_(menu: Menu, menuItem: MenuItem): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  menu | [Menu](./blockly.menu_class.md) | The Menu component clicked. |
|  menuItem | [MenuItem](./blockly.menuitem_class.md) | The MenuItem selected within menu. |
